original: Namicchattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… nasammattaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …pe… naaniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca …. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na micchatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca pe na sammatta niyatam dhammam paṭicca pe na aniyatam dhammam paṭicca saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekūnatiṁsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa …pe… vipāke nava …pe… avigate ekūnatiṁsa.
analyzed: hetuyā ekūnatisa ārammaṇe catuvīsa pe vipāke nava pe avigate ekūnatisa
